search_results.title: Maria W. Piers
search_results.snippet: Maria Weigl Piers (May 17, 1911 – May 21, 1997) was an Austrian-born American psychologist, social worker, educator and prolific author

search_results.title: About the Author
search_results.snippet: Piers Steel likes to think he is among the world's foremost researchers and speakers on the science of motivation and procrastination.

search_results.title: About Piers
search_results.snippet: Piers Torday is an award-winning writer for children whose works include The Last Wild series. His latest book is Letters to a Dog.
